Reviews.Title: “Scariest hostel experience ever!”
Reviews.Author: Bbbeeeccc
Reviews.Content: tiny smelt sewerage bed slats broken shower flooded entire bars cut window enought climb wouldnt lock told baggage storage returned day trip hadnt late night storming walked definitely worth money feel safe staying staff decent upgrade night charged extra

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: martiangirl198
Reviews.Content: friends looking cheap stay central rome werent disappointed booked private bedroomed ensuite extremely pleased tv fridge situated blocks termini station rome 1 euro mile colloseum trevi fountain walk downside breakfast recommend paying 3 euros croissant roll jam selection drinks coffee tea easily walk road beautiful panini price overally definately recommend termini booked private seperate hostel comment vastly stay dorm

HotelInfo.Name: Termini Accommodation
HotelInfo.Address: Via Marghera No. 35, Int 9, III floor | Viale Castro Pretorio 64, 00185 Rome, Italy
